body: Gundamnguy thx for the info, I'm gonna make it a mission to collect all of this guys works.

Goddamn, this was so good I busted a megamultinut. The playful/strick mature fickle woman who suddenly seduces him and makes him fall, then drops him because he split from his GF. I need a sequal where shes fucks her son silly and makes him obsessed as well before dropping him like a hot potato when he drops his girl. This is a personal favorite of mine now!

Ahhhh,DAMN!  I went to check on all of your work in English and I found that the comments on the older ones have been deleted partially or completely. I know I read them but now I don't know what I said. Now I have to reread them just so I can praise you again. Wait! Was that the plan?
Sniff, sniff. I missed you bro...... I really did.
This was good up until page 52
wow that ending what a bitch. Left his girlfriend for her then she left him.
